title: Beats promotes ‘Move How You Want’ campaign for global Beats Fit Pro launch
content:
With Beats Fit Pro launching globally, Beats started promoting today a new campaign called Move How You Want with Naomi Osaka, Kaia Gerber, Vince Staples, and Quen Blackwell.

more…

The post Beats promotes ‘Move How You Want’ campaign for global Beats Fit Pro launch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: With Beats Fit Pro launching globally, Beats started promoting a new campaign called Move How You Want with interested influencers.
